title: New Year's Eve Community Party
description: Join us for a festive celebration to ring in 2025! Live music, refreshments, and a countdown to midnight. Family-friendly event with activities for all ages.

title: Community Yoga Class
description: Weekly yoga session for residents. All skill levels welcome. Bring your own mat if possible. Led by certified instructor Sarah Johnson.

title: Book Club Meeting
description: Monthly book club discussion. This month's book: 'The Midnight Library' by Matt Haig. Light refreshments provided.

title: Wine Tasting Evening
description: Experience a curated selection of fine wines from local vineyards. Includes appetizers and expert guidance. Perfect for wine enthusiasts.

title: Professional Networking Mixer
description: Monthly networking event for office tenants. Build connections, share ideas, and grow your professional network. Light refreshments provided.
